title: The Rumor About Julia
description: Julia Marin has always lived by her own rules. She knows that most of the other seniors at Sullivan High School think she's weird because of her offbeat style, her clunky old car, and her part-time job at a gas station. But Julia's never cared what other people think...until she starts dating Austin Worth, an incredible guy who just happens to be part of Sullivan's in crowd.Austin likes Julia the way she is, but his friends don't. And when Austin's best friend, Lucas, starts spreading vicious rumors about Julia's past, Austin doesn't know who to believe. Will Austin stick by Julia? Or will he choose his friends over his girlfriend?
author: Stephanie Sinclair
